h: College student killed, 46 injured in Road accident in Ariyalur

The bus was travelling from Jayankondam in Ariyalur district to Thuraiyur in Trichy district. Local people rushed to the scene and rescued the passengers. One of the passengers, a 20-year-old college student, died from his injuries before he was admitted to the Ariyalur government hospital. The Sendurai police have registered a case and are investigating the accident.

h: Haber Road accident exposes threat posed by encroachments
sub_h: A 32-year-old bike rider was mowed down by a truck on Friday on Heber Road in Trichy. The accident has exposed the threat posed by encroachments on arterial roads in Trichy City, which have been increasing the probability of twowheeler riders being knocked down from behind. In Friday's incident, the bike rider had taken a right turn around Parangiri Velu Park on Heber Road when he was fatally knocked down by the truck from behind while bad road and unsafe conditions for vehicles to take turns were blamed for the incident. The role of encroachments was undermined, Heber Road which connects Trichy District Court and Cantonment Police Station with congested Bhima Nagar and Palakkarai was once used for public transportation over the years as the road was encroached by shops, private and government buses were not allowed due to traffic bottlenecks. The recent eviction drives were not comprehensive enough to curtail shops from misusing public space. "Eateries have encroached around 3 feet 4 feet of vacant space if encroachments are evicted public transportation can be brought back on Heber Road," said a resident of Bhima Nagar.

Four cops injured in Road accident
Four killed, 7 injured as truck ploughs through vehicles in Tamil Nadu's Dharmapuri
sub_h: Four people died and seven others were injured when a container truck carrying cement load ploughed through 12 cars, a mini-van, a truck and a bike on the Thoppur ghat road of the Salem-Bengaluru National Highway near Dharmapuri around 4.15pm on Saturday. The truck was heading to Salem from Andhra Pradesh.

h: Three die, one injured in Road accident on Trichy-Madurai national highway
sub_h: Just when a multi-vehicle collision in Dharmapuri district of Tamil Nadu claimed four lives on Saturday evening, three people were spot dead in another Road accident on Trichy-Madurai national highway the same evening.

h: Four die in multi-vehicle collision in Tamil Nadu

Six die in Road accident near Tamil Nadu’s Krishnagiri
Four killed, three injured in Road accident in Sirumugai
Madurai: Special sub-inspector of Usilampatti taluk killed in Road accident
Engineers of bad roads that kill people can be booked, but in Tamil Nadu they go scot-free
sub_h: Every year, at least 100 people get killed and 700 are injured in accidents on potholed roads across Tamil Nadu. Of this, nearly one-third is in Chennai. Though road engineers from the concerned local body or highways department and the contractor, who laid or repaired the stretch, could be held accountable, hardly police book them for contributory negligence.

h: Six pilgrims from Nepal die in Tamil Nadu Road accident
sub_h: Six pilgrims from Nepal, including two women, died and 25 others sustained injuries when an omnibus rammed a minibus near Omalur in Salem district of Tamil Nadu in the early hours on Thursday.

h: Coimbatore: Pillion riders more prone to accidents
sub_h: As many as 297 people lost their lives in Road accidents across the district till October 25 compared to 387 during the same period last year, superintendent of police Ara Arularasu said.

h: Two die in Road accident near Chennai
Coimbatore: Underage driving: 14-yr-old boy, 32-year-old man killed
sub_h: A minor boy who was riding a scooter and a 32-year-old man on a motorcycle were killed in a Road accident in Mettupalayam on Friday.

h: Govt bus confiscated for failure to compensate Road accident victim
Coimbatore woman bitten by snake during Road accident dies
Three women from Haryana killed in Road accident
sub_h: Three women tourists from Haryana were killed when a speeding private bus hit the van in which they were travelling near Thirumangalam in Madurai district on Saturday morning.

h: DMDK man, father-in-law killed in Road accident
74 dead in 439 Road accidents in 3 months in Trichy district, says data
sub_h: Even as the Covid-19 lockdowns have significantly cut down public mobility, in the past three months Trichy district reported 439 Road accidents of which 74 were fatal. After analysing the causes that lead to Road accidents, the state highways department has reactivated the data management system (RADMS) meeting involving the stakeholders to suggest plausible solutions for reducing fatalities.

h: Four die in two Road accidents near Pudukkottai
Tamil Nadu tops in Road accidents for third year
sub_h: Tamil Nadu has the dubious distinction of recording the highest number of Road accidents in the country for the third successive year, though there were fewer than in the previous year. In 2019, Tamil Nadu saw 57,228 cases, while Madhya Pradesh was second with 51,641 cases and Karnataka third with 40,644. TN recorded 63,920 s in 2018.

h: Kanyakumari farmer gets kidney of Madurai Road accident victim

15 years on, accident victim to get Rs 21.5 lakh compensation

Tamil daily reporter dies in Road accident near Trichy
Salem: Two killed in Road accident
sub_h: Two persons including a 5-year-old boy died in a Road accident after a government bus rammed their bike near Hosur in Krishnagiri district on Friday.The deceased have been identified as P Manjula, 35, of Bengaluru and her son Anil, 5.

h: Two Chennai residents die in Road accident near Trichy
108 ambulance staff members return Rs 4 lakh to kin of Road accident victim in TN

sub_h: Six people, including a lawyer and a college student, died in separate Road accidents on the outskirts of Chennai on Tuesday night and in the early hours Wednesday.

h: Six including five of family die in TN Road accident

sub_h: A 20-year-old student studying at a private engineering college was fatally run over by a Madurai Corporation garbage truck at Villapuram on Wednesday.

h: Two policemen cover up accident case, evade seniors, now face heat
sub_h: Two city traffic policemen are in the dock, accused of fudging a Road accident case to let a DMK functionary go free.

h: 5 killed in separate Road accidents in 2 days
Two killed as bus collides with two-wheeler in Virudhunagar
sub_h: Two people were killed in an accident as a government bus collided with a two-wheeler at Kariapatti here during the late hours on Monday.

h: Murder accused dies in Road accident
sub_h: A 26-year-old man from Palani in Dindigul district, who was accused in a murder case, died of injuries he suffered in a recent Road accident.

h: Court staffer swindles Rs 1.5cr Road accident money; Madras HC to clean up system
Assistant director dies in Road accident near Annur
Road accidents spike after govt eases lockdown in Tamil Nadu
sub_h: After a steep decline in April, Road accident rate in the state has slowly started to increase since May 17, when lockdown norms were relaxed. Compared to the period between March 24 and May 17, road traffic accidents increased by almost double after May 17 in the city.

h: Tamil Nadu: Five die in Road accidents in Krishnagiri and Erode districts
sub_h: Five people, including a couple, died in different Road accidents in Krishnagiri and Erode districts of Tamil Nadu on Wednesday.

h: 7 killed in separate Road accidents in Madurai
sub_h: Seven people were killed in separate accidents in Madurai district police limits on Saturday and Sunday.

h: Revenue inspector on Covid-19 duty dies in TN Road accident
Tamil Nadu CM expresses shock over deaths of guest workers in UP Road accident
Two killed, 10 injured in Road accident in Thanjavur
sub_h: Two people were killed in a Road accident involving a tourist van and a two-wheeler near Athirampattinam in Thanjavur district.

h: Seven die in four Road accidents in Tamil Nadu’s Krishnagiri district
Tamil Nadu CM announces Rs 50lakh solatium for cop who died in Road accident
Isro engineer dies in Chennai Road accident
sub_h: An engineer at the Indian Space Research Organisation (Isro) died after the two-wheeler he was riding on rammed a stationary pickup three-wheeler on the Outer Ring Road at Morai near Avadi here on Tuesday afternoon.

h: Underage driver, student killed in Road accident
9-year-old girl killed in Road accident
Greater Chennai Corporation aims to halve Road accident fatalities in 5 years
sub_h: Greater Chennai Corporation, through its smart city project, has embarked on an ambitious goal to reduce the number of Road accident fatalities in the city by half in the next five years, and plans to make vital changes in the city’s infrastructure to get there.

h: Chennai: Narrow escape for two in Road accidents
sub_h: In separate Road accidents, two, including a medical student, had narrow escapes at GNT Road near Puzhal and Anna Nagar on Tuesday.

h: Murder accused injured in Road accident dies
Couple on bike killed in accident
Four paramedical college students among five killed in Road accident near Avinashi in Tamil Nadu
sub_h: Four students of a private paramedical college in Salem and the driver of a sport utility vehicle (SUV) they were travelling in died on the spot when the SUV rammed the rear side of a truck near Avinashi in Tirupur district of Tamil Nadu on Thursday morning. Three students suffered injuries in the mishap.

h: ‘No Road accident death in Chennai since March 27’
sub_h: Fewer vehicles on the roads mean fewer accidents, Since March 27, three days after the nationwide lockdown kicked in, there has been no Road accident fatality in Chennai.

h: Schoolteacher dies in Chennai Road accident
sub_h: A woman schoolteacher riding pillion on a two-wheeler died after being knocked down by a minitruck in Red Hills here on Wednesday morning.

h: Trichy: Four killed in two Road accidents in Karur, Thanjavur
sub_h: Four people were killed in two Road accidents that happened in in Karur and Thanjavur on Saturday night. Police have registered cases and are investigating into it.

h: Two killed, eight seriously injured in Road accident
sub_h: Two people were killed and eight others grievously injured in a Road accident involving a head-on collision between a car and lorry near Musiri on Sunday. According to the police, the deceased have been identified as P Azhagappan, 45, native of Kezhla Sevalpatti in Karaikudi, and K Sathish, 19, a resident of Alangudi in Pudukottai district.

h: Madurai: Man killed in accident involving multiple vehicles
sub_h: A 32-year-old man was killed in a Road accident involving multiple vehicles near Nagamalai Pudukottai in Madurai district in the early hours of Wednesday.

h: 9 students injured in Road accident
sub_h: Nine school students were injured in a Road accident involving a share-auto rickshaw and a truck and were hospitalized

h: TOI correspondent, mother die in Road accident near Tirupur in Tamil Nadu
sub_h: The Times of India correspondent R K Rajasekaran, 31, and his mother, Jamuna Rani, 55, died when a car they were travelling in collided with a Tamil Nadu Road Transport Corporation bus near Avinashi in Tirupur district on Wednesday.

h: 19 students injured as school bus overturns near Madurai
sub_h: As many as 19 students suffered injuries and a boy lost his left arm when a school bus overturned at Poonjuthi in Madurai district of Tamil Nadu on Monday.

h: Three killed in Road accident in Krishnagiri district
Two youths die in Chennai Road accident while trying to escape after snatching man’s debit card
sub_h: Two youths, who were trying to escape from police after snatching a debit card of a 37-year-old man, died when the two-wheeler they were travelling on collided with a Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation (TNSTC) bus at Panaiyur near Chennai on Saturday night.

h: Five killed in Road accident near Kodai Road in Dindigul
sub_h: Five people including three members of the same family were killed in a Road accident near Kodai Road in Dindigul district on Saturday. The accident occurred near the bridge on Kodai Road after the driver of one of the car involved in the accident hit a cyclist, lost control and collided head-on with another car.

h: Kerala couple dies in Road accident near Thanjavur
Tamil Nadu health minister’s personal assistant dies in Road accident
sub_h: Tamil Nadu health minister C Vijaya Baskar’s personal assistant and driver died on the spot when a sport utility vehicle they were travelling in rammed a roadside tree near Illuppur in Pudukkottai district of Tamil Nadu in the early hours of Sunday.

h: Four people killed in Road accidents in Karur, Thanjavur
sub_h: Four people including two women were killed and 12 others injured in three separate Road accidents in Thanjavur and Karur on Saturday and Sunday

h: Steps taken by police ensure no major accidents during revelry
Three dead, 17 injured in Road accident near Ariyalur
Girl, 12, dies, eight others injured in Road accident in Madurai
sub_h: A 12-year-old girl from Tuticorin district was killed in a Road accident that took place near Kottampatti in Madurai district on Saturday. The accident took place when the car in which she was travelling hit a centre median. Eight more people travelling in the same vehicle suffered injuries and were treated in a private hospital.

h: Cop, two college students die in TN Road accident
sub_h: A police constable and two college students died when two motorcycles collided with each other on the Thirumangalam-Rajapalayam highway in Madurai district of Tamil Nadu on Friday.

h: Two killed in Road accident in Madurai
Police act tough, bring down fatal Road accidents by 55%
sub_h: The traffic wing of the city police have outshone their counterparts in the State by bringing down the number of fatal Road accidents.

h: Road accident: MTC told to pay Rs 96,000 to injured Chennai boy
sub_h: A motor accident claims tribunal in Chennai has directed Metropolitan Transport Corporation (MTC) to pay a compensation of Rs 96,000 to a teenager who sustained injuries while travelling in an MTC bus.

h: Woman dies in Chennai Road accident
sub_h: A 63-year-old woman riding pillion on her son’s two-wheeler was fatally knocked down by an unidentified vehicle at Ennore here on Saturday night.

h: Three of family killed on spot in an accident
sub_h: Three members of a family were killed on the spot in an accident involving their two-wheeler and a car at Panavadalichatram village in Tenkasi district on Tuesday evening.

h: Ambulance driver, patient killed in Road accident in Chennai
sub_h: A 75-year-old woman patient and an ambulance driver died and two others were injured after the ambulance rammed into a private staff bus near Athur in Kancheepuram in the wee hours of Friday.

h: Road accident turns out to be planned contract killing bid
sub_h: Almost a week after 25-year-old man was charred to death and a 40-year-old woman suffered nearly 60% burns when the car they were travelling in caught fire after it was hit by a truck near Hosur here, police on Sunday said that was a cold-blooded murder (bid) and not an accident.

h: Techie dies in Chennai Road accident
sub_h: A techie died when a minitruck hit his two-wheeler on the Anna flyover here on Saturday night.

h: Milk vendor dies in Chennai Road accident
sub_h: A 21-year-old man riding on a two-wheeler died on the spot after being knocked down by a speeding truck on the Poonamallee High Road here in the early hours of Monday.

h: 3 of a family die in Road accident
sub_h: A nine-year-old is the sole survivor of his family after his parents and younger brother were killed when the car they were travelling in had a head-on collision with a container truck in Tiruvallur on Friday night.

h: 7 killed in separate Road accidents
Usilampatti police sub-division records zero Road accident deaths in 3 months
